db:abstract.db:para: Provides classes to create your own custom widget plugins for Qt Designer and classes to access Qt Designer components.

db:article.db:para: In addition, the QFormBuilder class provides the possibility of constructing user interfaces from UI files at run-time.

db:note.db:para: This documentation covers the tool Qt Designer and classes related to building graphical user interfaces for Qt Widgets. Qt Design Studio is a UI composition tool that covers all steps of UI design and implementation for Qt Quick user interfaces.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module's C++ API requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module component in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Designer) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt6::Designer)
db:section.db:para: For more details, see the Build with CMake overview.
